publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4203 Stewart Stevenson: The Draft Town and Country Planning (Charges for Publication of Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2009—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Town and Country Planning (Charges for Publication of Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2009 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*

S3M-4203 Stewart Stevenson: The Draft Town and Country Planning (Charges for Publication of Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2009—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Town and Country Planning (Charges for Publication of Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2009 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney
